title: Peterson is a Protestant like Dillahunty is a Christian
description:
The Philip Dodd conversation was very interesting on many levels. One of the things that caught a lot of people's attention was how Dodd kept calling JBP a "Protestant" and even an "Evangelical". He also challenged JBP in a number of ways that were instructive and fodder for more exploration. 

Dodd Conversation https://youtu.be/eCnbzIkV_5M 
Ryan Reeves on The Great Schism https://youtu.be/Q_s9Rcsg5UI 
Ronald Reagan City on a Hill Speech https://youtu.be/c32G868tor0 
MLK Jr. Mountaintop Speech https://youtu.be/Oehry1JC9Rk 
Christianity Today Quick to Listen https://www.christianitytoday.com/ct/podcasts/quick-to-listen/ 

Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay 

Audio Only Podcast Version https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

My podcast on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333
